rule_1: To win the game you must open all 9 cards, sequentially, in ascending order.
rule_2: The cards obey their value referring to the French deck, with A (ace) being the smallest card that represents the value 1.
rule_3: Therefore, the sequence in which you must open the cards is: A, 2, 3, 4, ..., 9.
rule_4: 1 move will be counted whenever you click on a card.
rule_5: Open all the cards, with the fewest moves that you can, to reach and maintain your position on the local scoreboard.
rule_6: The local scoreboard records the top 5 players for each difficulty.
rule_7: Do not be greedy! Start at the easy level and start playing others according to your skill.
about_1: This game was created with the objective of studying the React Native framework, the source code and other information are available through the developer's Github which is informed below.
about_3: Image of the splash screen, all rights reserved to Venexiana Dark Playing Cards.
about_4: Image of the "back" of the cards, all rights reserved to Venexiana Dark Playing Cards.
